Every year Only
1% INDIANS Donate Blood.

That's Why 12,000 LIVES are lost every day to Blood Shortage.

Donate Blood Request for Blood

Blood

Understanding Blood: Your Lifesaving Gift

Every drop of blood you donate can save lives. Whether it's for accident victims, patients undergoing surgery, or individuals with medical conditions, your donation makes a significant impact.

Types of Donations

  • Whole Blood Donation
  • Platelet Donation
  • Plasma Donation
  • Double Red Cell Donation

Hunger Free Nandyal

According to the world statistics from THE WORLD COUNTS Around 9 million people die every year of hunger and hunger-related diseases. Surveys further says that a Child dies from hunger every 10 sec.

Friends For Seva wants to stop this through HUNGER FREE NANDYAL by providing Quality food for the people who are in need at Bus Stand, Railway Station, Govt Hospital etc.,

Join Us → For More Details →

Articles

Make a difference with us! Our organization conducts blood donation events to assist patients in emergency need of blood

  • Aug 17, 2016 Blood Donation

    Phaneendra & Vishnu Gayathri

    "This couple organized a blood donation camp on their wedding day, and they actively participated by donating blood as well."

  • Dec 07, 2014 FFS Activities

    Left over food in messes

    "Daily lot of high quality food is left over in the messes in college which is just thrown away as they don't have to time to distribute to the needy. FFS team took that responsibility and distributed more that 30000 packets during college time."

  • Sep 27, 2013 FFS Activities

    Funds collection in college

    "FFS people have been doing service activities since 2009. Whenever people comes with a request of health issue or physical disability or any other thing, we will collect funds through out the college to collect funds and give it to the needy."

  • Feb 17, 2023 Blood Donation

    Surya Teja & Bhavya

    "This couple inspired by Raguru Phaneendra and organized a blood donation camp on their wedding day, and they actively participated by donating blood as well."

  • Dec 7, 2014 FFS Activities

    About Friends For Seva activities

    *Education to needy
    *Blood donations
    *Left over Food distribution to people in mess
    *Visiting Orphanages/Old age homes and satisfying their requirements.
    Education to needy
    and many more

  • Aug 15, 2023 Friends For Seva

    Hunger Free Nandyal

    "Launching Program Hunger Free Nandyal from Friends For Seva on 15th August 2023 Dedicated to the needy people"
